name: Forest Getaway
description: During the COVID-19 pandemic, the one thing I've longed for above all else is the ability to escape to the wilderness. Whether it's being cooped up inside my Downtown LA apartment or missing the nature trails back home in Georgia, I decided to use my skills to make my own little paradise. At the Forest Getaway, you're automatically great at skipping rocks and playing guitar, and you can wander around the woods and listen to the wildlife both during the day and at night.
